remarks: Combine the results of ~ dchrvmasumlem1 and ~ dchrvmasum2lem inside a conditional.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
rpvmasum.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Z ) $.
rpvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
rpvmasum.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
rpvmasum.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
rpvmasum.1 $e |- .1. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
dchrisum.b $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrisum.n1 $e |- ( ph -> X =/= .1. ) $.
dchrvmasum.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
dchrvmasum2.2 $e |- ( ph -> 1 <_ A ) $.
dchrvmasum2if $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` n ) ) x. ( ( Lam ` n ) / n ) ) + if ( ps , ( log ` A ) , 0 ) ) = sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( ( ( X ` ( L ` d ) ) x. ( ( mmu ` d ) / d ) ) x. sum_ m e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( A / d ) ) ) ( ( X ` ( L ` m ) ) x. ( ( log ` if ( ps , ( A / d ) , m ) ) / m ) ) ) ) $.
$d .1. m n $.
$d A d m n $.
$d D m n $.
$d L d m n $.
$d N m n $.
$d X d m n $.
$d Z m n $.
$d d m n ph $.
$d d m ps $.
